snippet.title: Drums Rock - Official Simple Plan DLC Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Drums Rock's latest trailer showcases new DLC available for the arcade drums game for VR. Get ready to rock with the Simple Plan music pack, featuring the songs "Welcome to My Life," "Crazy," "Time to Say Goodbye," and "Shut Up!" The Simple Plan DLC for Drums Rock is available now on PlayStation VR2 and Steam.
